description.value: Cuboid bottle containing 'Tabloid' arsenious iodide gr 1/21 and mecuric iodide gr 1/21. From 'Tabloid' medicine chest in metal case, containing materia medica in glass stoppered jars (Pts 4 - 38), by Burroughs Wellcome & Company, London, England, 1900-1909.   Used by Teddy Roosevelt on African Expedition, 1909.
